This call is to a method from API 18, the call containing class androidx.media2.session.MediaControllerImplLegacy is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 18. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(18) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(18).
